Where can I check the delivery?: We don't support any services to track the location, but the customer is able to receive the current status through message.
What do I need if I want to refund the p: In order to get refund, you need order id and the name of customer.
Can I request additional books that are: If there are many requests, we will add them after reviewing them.
How can I get the discount?: The discount rate is be based on the previous purchase history, and 10% is the max discount.
How can I rate a book?: People that have purchased a book can only rate a book.
Can I purchase a digital book?: We don't support any digital version of a book. This feature will be added later on.
When can I get my book?: Normally, it will take 2 ~ 3 days, but it can be up to 7 days depends on the location.
What's the standard for best selling boo: It depends on sold quantities. It will be updated in realtime
How to find a book that I want to search: You should know the name, or item id
What if it is out of stock?: We check the our inventory regularly, but the customer can request if the stock is not supplemented.
